name: HISTERICUM SOLARIA
description:
An unprecedented mix of turn-based, RPG style rhythm game, and visual novel. A perfect game for achievers and explorers alike.  

Use your skills and reflexes to survive. The deeper you get, the more chances that you’ll fight battle-tainted creatures through music. Avoid their intricate traps, all to solve an ancient history of magic and restore your former glory.  

Histericum Solaria can be played through a browser, Windows and MacOS. However, it is still under development (Prototype Phase) and currently, I am still working with its Twine version. A simple gameplay without any rhythm vs battles, complex world traveling, etc.

Please note that the game is still incomplete and looks unpolished. By making a demo available soon, I’m hoping to hear some feedback and suggestions to improve a specific feature or the game itself.

I am Quaser Novus who is currently doing every detail in the game such as SFX, Artwork, Storytelling, etc. Also, the image/s (Character Icons) I used as placeholders belongs to their rightful owners. In due time, I’ll update these and put mine. 

I would like to say this in advance so that I may not disappoint you— The fate of this project is still unknown but I'll keep on putting constant updates.

 “Go onwards, Young spirit!”
